movie.title: Unstoppable
movie.plot: A runaway train, transporting deadly, toxic chemicals, is barreling down on Stanton, Pennsylvania,  and proves to be unstoppable until a veteran engineer and young conductor risk their lives to try and stop it with a switch engine.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 13 nominations.

events.title: a CSX Transportation freight train carrying hazardous chemicals runs out of control
